{"id":1225286808,"question_id":3372,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1712457182,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1225286808/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Strictly Increasing or Strictly Decreasing Subarray","memory":"43.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int longestMonotonicSubarray(int[] nums) {\n        \n        int cnt = 1 ;\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        int res =1;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len-1 ;i++){\n            if(nums[i]<nums[i+1]){\n                cnt++;\n                res = Math.max(cnt, res);\n            }else \n                cnt=1;\n        }\n        cnt=1;\n         for(int i=len-2; i>=0 ;i--){\n            if(nums[i]>nums[i+1]){\n                cnt++;\n                res = Math.max(cnt, res);\n            }else \n                cnt=1;\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-strictly-increasing-or-strictly-decreasing-subarray","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
